__e: We're different, and it's always going to be that way. And it's not easy--
Now, we're all very different people, and that's a good thing.
You no longer know who I am either, because we're different. What?
Even though we're so different... I feel like I've always known you.
On this day, let us all remember that no people on this Earth are really enemies, only folks with differences.
